title: Badlands National Park: Mammal List
body: Mammal List               Badlands Mammal List      Common Name   Scientific Name   Abundance     pronghorn   Antilocapra americana   Common     American bison   Bison bison   Common     bighorn sheep   Ovis canadensis   Common     coyote   Canis latrans   Common     swift fox   Vulpes velox   Uncommon     red fox   Vulpes vulpes   Uncommon     American beaver   Castor canadensis   Occasional     elk   Cervus elaphus   Rare     mule deer   Odocoileus hemionus   Common     white-tailed deer   Odocoileus virginianus   Common     North American porcupine   Erethizon dorsatum   Common     bobcat   Lynx rufus   Common     mountain lion   Puma concolor   Rare     white-tailed jackrabbit   Lepus townsendii   Occasional     desert cottontail   Sylvilagus audubonii   Unknown     eastern cottontail   Sylvilagus floridanus   Common     striped skunk   Mephitis mephitis   Uncommon     prairie vole   Microtus ochrogaster   Uncommon     bushy-tailed woodrat   Neotoma cinerea   Unknown     common muskrat   Ondatra zibethicus   Occasional     white-footed mouse   Peromyscus leucopus   Common     deer mouse   Peromyscus maniculatus   Common     long-tailed weasel   Mustela frenata   Occasional     black-footed ferret   Mustela nigripes   Uncommon     least weasel   Mustela nivalis   Unknown     American badger   Taxidea taxus   Common     northern raccoon   Procyon lotor   Occasional     black-tailed prairie dog   Cynomys ludovicianus   Common     thirteen-lined ground squirrel   Spermophilus tridecemlineatus   Common     least chipmunk   Tamias minimus   Common     Townsend's big-eared bat   Corynorhinus townsendii   Uncommon     big brown bat   Eptesicus fuscus   Common     silver-haired bat   Lasionycteris noctivagans   Unknown     hoary bat   Lasiurus cinereus   Uncommon     western small-footed bat   Myotis ciliolabrum   Common     little brown bat   Myotis lucifugus   Uncommon     northern long-eared bat   Myotis septentrionalis   Uncommon     Black Hills fringed bat   Myotis thysanodes pahasapensis   Uncommon     long-legged bat   Myotis volans   Uncommon
